statements: SELECT * FROM ProductionReports ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT report_id, compliance_status FROM ProductionReports WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8
SELECT * FROM ProductionReports WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT production_date, efficiency_rating FROM ProductionReports ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC
SELECT report_id, production_date FROM ProductionReports WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM ProductionReports WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8 ORDER BY production_date DESC, report_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_id, production_date, compliance_status FROM ProductionReports WHERE compliance_status = 'Pass' ORDER BY production_date ASC
SELECT report_id, AVG(efficiency_rating) AS avg_rating FROM ProductionReports GROUP BY report_id HAVING avg_rating > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM ProductionReports WHERE compliance_status = 'Fail' AND production_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT MAX(efficiency_rating) AS max_rating, MIN(efficiency_rating) AS min_rating FROM ProductionReports WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM production_reports ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT report_id, production_date FROM production_reports WHERE efficiency_score > 0.8;
SELECT report_id, production_date, efficiency_score FROM production_reports WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT report_id, report_date, compliance_status FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_reports ORDER BY production_date ASC, efficiency_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_id, production_date FROM production_reports WHERE efficiency_score > 0.8 AND production_date <= '2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status='Approved' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT production_date, efficiency_score FROM production_reports WHERE efficiency_score BETWEEN 0.6 AND 0.8;
SELECT report_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM ProductionEfficiencyReports WHERE production_units > 100
SELECT report_id, production_date, product_name FROM ProductionEfficiencyReports ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT product_name, production_units FROM ProductionEfficiencyReports WHERE production_units BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM ComplianceReports WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc.'
SELECT company_name, compliance_level FROM ComplianceReports ORDER BY compliance_level
SELECT * FROM ProductionEfficiencyReports WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT company_name, compliance_level FROM ComplianceReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY compliance_level ASC
SELECT report_id, product_name, production_units FROM ProductionEfficiencyReports WHERE product_name LIKE '%product%'
SELECT production_date, product_name FROM ProductionEfficiencyReports WHERE production_units > 100 ORDER BY production_date ASC
SELECT * FROM ProductionEfficiencyReports WHERE production_date <= '2022-09-30'
SELECT * FROM production_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM production_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_standards WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT report_id, compliance_data FROM production_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_reports;
SELECT report_date, production_data FROM production_reports WHERE report_id = 100;
SELECT standard_name, compliance_level FROM regulatory_standards ORDER BY standard_name DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM production_metrics WHERE metric_value >= 100;
SELECT report_id, report_date, compliance_data FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT production_date, efficiency_score FROM reports ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT department_name, manager_name FROM departments WHERE manager_name = 'Alice';
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body FROM regulations WHERE regulation_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY production_date DESC, efficiency_score ASC;
SELECT report_id, efficiency_score, compliance_status FROM reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT department_name, manager_name FROM departments WHERE manager_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(production_quantity) AS avg_quantity, department FROM production_data JOIN employees ON department = departments.department_name GROUP BY department ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC;
